content: Total sales for the first quarter of 2022 was $64.8 million, a decrease of 8.5% from $70.8 million in the first quarter of 2021. Sales for the company's branded fashion apparel retail division decreased by 26.7% to $34.9 million for the first quarter of 2022 compared with $47.6 million for the first quarter of 2021. Sales for the company's wholesale division increased by 28.7% to $29.9 million for the first quarter of 2022 compared with $23.2 million for the first quarter of 2021. Gross profit of retail business decreased by 34.8% to $11.7 million for the first quarter of 2022 compared with $17.9 million for the first quarter of 2021. Gross profit for the wholesale business increased by 25.2% to $5.7 million for the first quarter of 2022 compared with $4.6 million for the first quarter of 2021. Selling expenses for the first quarter of 2022 decreased by 12% to $13.7 million or 21.1% of total sales compared with $15.5 million or 22% of total sales for the first quarter of 2021.
